entries.journal_entry_description: Looks like R2-D2 was damaged fighting the Imperials. Jolka needs a new power converter to fix him. You can take one from the malfunctioning droids in the lower level.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Use the elevator to head down to the lower level.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Lower Level
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The Astromech needs a new power converter. Go to the lower level and try to get an intact one from the malfunctioning droids.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Destroy Droids in the Droid Repair Center
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Use the elevator to return to the main level.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to Return to the Main Level
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: nNow that you have the power converter return to Jolka with it, so he can install it.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Return to Jolka in Docking Bay 2
